content.text: The purpose of the institutional repository (IR) of Leibniz-Zentrum Moderner Orient (ZMO) is to assure preservation, dissemination, and visibility of the scholarly output of the institution.

metadataPolicy.text: The bibliographic metadata available through this interface, with the exception of abstracts, is licensed under CC0 and can be freely shared and reused.

dataPolicy.text: Unless explicitly stated, all publications and electronic documents provided on this platform must be used in accordance with copyright laws and are subject to all rights reserved.

submissionPolicy.text: ZMO IR provides free and open access to scholarly works and historical materials produced and collected by the ZMO whereas it is possible.

eprints.comment: This institutional repository is powered by the MyCoRe repository software, see http://www.mycore.de/ for more information.
